description.narrative: Capacity enhanced at state and district levels for planning, implementation, budgeting and public financial management for most disadvantaged children., which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Hiv Prevention, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Component Results (PCR) 2: Protective and learning environment Programme Component Results (PCR) 3: Adolescent participation and empowerment

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Capacity enhanced at state and district levels for planning, implementation, budgeting and public financial management for mostdisadvantaged children.

description.narrative: State teacher education system is strengthened to incorporate child friendly pedagogies, develop evidence based teacher education plan and integrate assessments for delivering equitable quality education. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2018

title.narrative: No. of states with Teacher Education Plans that meet RTE Standards (Standards are set by National Curriculum Framework 2005, National Council of Teacher Education and RTE. This includes addressing supply, demand and quality assurance of teachers including: a) Pupil Teacher Ratio < 30 at primary level and > 35 at upper primary level b) Professional qualifications prescribed by NCTE c) Teacher eligibility test d) Academic support structure (SCERT, DIET, BRC, CRC) linked to learning outcomes)
No. of states that have plans to roll out good practices regarding the teacher support structure

baseline.value: AP, Gujarat, Karnataka, Kerala, Tamil Nadu

actual.value: 2016:Bihar, Chhattisgarh, Gujarat, Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Rajasthan are has established teacher support structures to roll out child centred interventions. The range of programs to strengthen teacher support structures include strengthening DIETs, improving pre-service teacher training curriculum,

title.narrative: No. of states that incorporate comprehensive plans for child friendly teaching methodologies ( Teaching methodology based on CFSS principles, teaching curriculum including hygiene education. Activity-Based Learning (ABL), and mother tongue instruction in lower grades)

baseline.value: AP, Gujarat, Karnataka, Kerala, Tamil Nadu
